CustomField.description: Collector from Project Managers User record
CustomField.formula: IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Lead_Source__c , 'National Account (ERA, Contract, Etc)'), Default_Collector__c <> TRUE) , 'Cassandra O`Neill', IF(AND( Default_Collector__c <> TRUE, OR (ISPICKVAL( Lead_Source__c , 'Program - Lionsbridge'), ISPICKVAL( Lead_Source__c , 'Program - Alacrity Services'), ISPICKVAL( Lead_Source__c , 'Program - Alacrity Consumer Services') ) ), 'Alicia Sierra', IF (Default_Collector__c = TRUE, Project_Manager__r.Collector__r.FirstName & " " & Project_Manager__r.Collector__r.LastName , Project_Manager__r.Collector__r.FirstName & " " & Project_Manager__r.Collector__r.LastName ) ))
CustomField.label: Collector
